  • All Client-Side - Everything runs in your browser, no server needed

About MCTS

Monte Carlo Tree Search is a powerful algorithm used in game AI. It works by:

  1. Selection - Navigate the tree using UCB1 formula to balance exploration and exploitation
  2. Expansion - Add new nodes for unexplored moves
  3. Simulation - Play out random games to estimate move quality
  4. Backpropagation - Update statistics up the tree based on simulation results
